trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"> </xref> evento del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The CustomizeLegendEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event.
trans-unit.target: La classe CustomizeLegendEventArgs viene utilizzata nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: There are only two properties in this class.
trans-unit.target: Sono disponibili solo due proprietà di questa classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A> property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items, and to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A>proprietà consente di eliminare o modificare predefinite e gli elementi della legenda personalizzati e per aggiungere gli elementi della legenda personalizzato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to change the order of legend items.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può essere utilizzata anche per modificare l'ordine degli elementi della legenda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A> property is used to identify the legend that raised this event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A>proprietà viene utilizzata per identificare la legenda che ha generato l'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> and legend name.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"> </xref> e il nome della legenda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The legend name.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della legenda.

trans-unit.source: Used to remove, modify or change the order of both custom and default legend items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Consente di rimuovere, modificare o cambiare l'ordine delle personalizzati e predefiniti gli elementi della legenda nel <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Can also be used to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: Consente inoltre di aggiungere elementi della legenda personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: The LegendItems property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event, and to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà LegendItems consente di eliminare o modificare predefinite e le voci di legenda personalizzate nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>evento e per aggiungere gli elementi della legenda personalizzato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: The order of legend items can also be changed.
trans-unit.target: L'ordine degli elementi della legenda può anche essere modificato.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A> and [LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) properties can be used to determine the data element that is associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A>e [LegendItem. SeriesPointIndex](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) proprietà possono essere utilizzate per determinare l'elemento dati associato a un elemento della legenda predefiniti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: These properties will return zero-length strings for custom legend items, because custom items are not associated with chart data.
trans-unit.target: Queste proprietà verranno restituite le stringhe di lunghezza zero per gli elementi della legenda personalizzati, perché gli elementi personalizzati non sono associati a dati del grafico.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> the event was raised for, which enables you to customize an individual [Legend](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà consente di determinare quale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>dell'evento, che consente di personalizzare un singolo [legenda](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object, which can be used to determine which legend was the sender of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> oggetto, che può essere usato per determinare quale legenda è il mittente del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valore che rappresenta il nome dell'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> oggetto.
